archimate:Plateau.name: OO 6: Maincam Phase 1 Bundle (Plateau)
archimate:Plateau.documentation: The Maincam Phase one bundel provides for full speed production archiving of main cam data, and for for prompt processing at NCSA to produce paratmeters to be returned to the observatory. Processing supports calibrations, and sceince images processing needed to provide the needed characterixation of images. this charaterization stops short of difference imagding.
